What are the treatments for Miller Fisher Syndrome ?,Treatment for Miller Fisher syndrome is identical to treatment for Guillain-Barr syndrome: intravenous immunoglobulin (IVIg) or plasmapheresis (a procedure in which antibodies are removed from the blood) and supportive care.,NINDS,Miller Fisher Syndrome
